title: Frozen
short_plot_summary: Elsa accidentally unleashes her ice powers, plunging her kingdom into eternal winter. Her sister, Anna, teams up with friends to find Elsa and bring back summer.
explanation: A snowflake, representing the eternal winter caused by Elsa's ice powers
Two girls, symbolizing Elsa and Anna, the sister duo at the heart of the story
A castle, illustrating the royal setting of the movie and Elsa's position as queen
A snowman, representing Olaf, the lovable snowman who helps Anna and her friends on their journey
A musical note, signaling the musical aspect of the movie, featuring songs like 'Let It Go'
